result.html: bhí mise óg tráth freisinI was young once, too.
result.ponchtml: ḃí mise óg tráṫ freisinI was young once, too.

result.eng: It will be done in its own proper time.
result.ga: déanfar in am agus i dtráth é
result.orig: Déanfar in am agus i dtráth é
result.html: déanfar in am agus i dtráth éIt will be done in its own proper time.
result.ponchtml: déanfar in am agus i dtráṫ éIt will be done in its own proper time.

result.html: i dtrátha na bliana 535 rcAround the year 535 BC.
result.ponchtml: i dtráṫa na bliana 535 rcAround the year 535 BC.

result.eng: We came at about three o'clock.
result.ga: tháinig muid i dtrátha a trí a chlog
result.orig: Tháinig muid i dtrátha a trí a chlog
result.html: tháinig muid i dtrátha a trí a chlogWe came at about three o'clock.
result.ponchtml: ṫáinig muid i dtráṫa a trí a ċlogWe came at about three o'clock.

result.eng: Milosevic was not solely responsible for every crime against humanity that happened while Yugoslavia was falling apart.
result.ga: níorbh é milosevic amháin faoi ndear gach coir in aghaidh na daonnachta a tharla tráth titim as a chéile don iúgslaiv
result.orig: Níorbh é Milosevic amháin faoi ndear gach coir in aghaidh na daonnachta a tharla tráth titim as a chéile don Iúgslaiv
result.html: níorbh é milosevic amháin faoi ndear gach coir in aghaidh na daonnachta a tharla tráth titim as a chéile don iúgslaivMilosevic was not solely responsible for every crime against humanity that happened while Yugoslavia was falling apart.
result.ponchtml: níorḃ é milosevic aṁáin faoi ndear gaċ coir in aġaiḋ na daonnaċta a ṫarla tráṫ titim as a ċéile don iúgslaivMilosevic was not solely responsible for every crime against humanity that happened while Yugoslavia was falling apart.

result.eng: They were a considerable list once [ie. there were a lot of them].
result.ga: liosta le háireamh a bhí iontu tráth den saol
result.orig: Liosta le háireamh a bhí iontu tráth den saol
result.html: liosta le háireamh a bhí iontu tráth den saolThey were a considerable list once [ie. there were a lot of them].
result.ponchtml: liosta le háireaṁ a ḃí iontu tráṫ den saolThey were a considerable list once [ie. there were a lot of them].

result.eng: But many of them look tired now.
result.ga: ach tá cuma spíonta ar chuid mhór acu fán tráth seo
result.orig: Ach tá cuma spíonta ar chuid mhór acu fán tráth seo
result.html: ach tá cuma spíonta ar chuid mhór acu fán tráth seoBut many of them look tired now.
result.ponchtml: aċ tá cuma spíonta ar ċuid ṁór acu fán tráṫ seoBut many of them look tired now.
